comment._content: Esefjorden today: www.sognafoto.no/bilde.asp?key=9417 www.sognafoto.no/bilde.asp?key=9421 I belive it's Kviknes Hotel in Balestrand at left, on sognafoto 9417 picture: rlb.no/hotel/info/7 en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esefjorden

comment.author: 34405198@N02
comment._content: The small buildings to the left on this photo is a prosperity called Munken, a croft by the sea. Note the vessel. It is a Sognejekt, a sail ship mostly used for carrying firewood to Bergen.
